snippet.title: Battlebit Remastered Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Battlebit Remastered is having open tests on Saturdays and this is gameplay footage all from the play test on the 25th June. Battlebit is a combination of Battlefield and something more tactical like Squad and turning out to be one of the best shooters of 2022. Battlefield 4 theme to suite this fan made trailer.

How to play Battlebit Remastered? Head over to their Twitter for updates on when you can play next for free! 
https://twitter.com/BattleBitGame?s=20&t=NiSFGflpa2NcSeQNyJnW_Q

If you liked this video, please hit the like button and subscribe for more Battlebit Remastered in the future!

SUBSCRIBE HERE: https://www.youtube.com/c/BIGBodsta
Watch Live On Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/bigbodsta
